title: CLI: npx neon eval runs tests locally
acceptance_criteria: npx neon eval command discovers and runs test files
Supports glob patterns for test file discovery (e.g., **/*.eval.ts)
Console output shows test progress with pass/fail status
Summary at end: total tests, passed, failed, duration
Individual test case results with scorer names and scores
Exit code 0 on all pass, non-zero on any failure
Error handling with clear error messages for common issues
